segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a slice of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron is methodically drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on, and the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down the cabinet doors, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, one foot in the mess without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, kids are raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is such a sloppy disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in an open jar, water everywhereâ€”it's all so gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the tidy garden outside can't hide the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR
